entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
